edge: The film's soundtrack was released in two separate versions; one for the 19 popular artists' songs used in the film, and another separate release for the original score composed for the film by Danny Elfman.
Two of Elfman's themes were also included on the popular artists' version of the soundtrack release.
The film's theme song, "I Don't Wanna Live Forever" by Zayn and Taylor Swift was released on December 9, 2016.
The following month, on January 13, 2017, Halsey released the soundtrack's next single, "Not Afraid Anymore".
